summary: The "Fix Our Forests Act" addresses forest management and wildfire mitigation. It focuses on landscape-scale restoration, community wildfire risk reduction, and litigation reform related to wildfires. Key aspects include designating fireshed management areas, establishing a Wildfire Intelligence Center, promoting prescribed fire, and protecting communities in the wildland-urban interface. The bill also covers transparency, technology, partnerships, and casualty assistance for firefighters, alongside provisions for white oak resilience.
